title: The Alan Clark Diaries (2004) Complete Series
description:
The Alan Clark Diaries (2004) complete series TVRip 


Alan Clarke is the member of parliament for Plymouth Sutton, where he longs for a "proper" role as a Minister in Thatcher's government. When he gets the call he joins government but is totally unprepared for the commitment involved, and is totally unable (and unwilling) to manage the rigours of bill reading and committees. Despite this he rises up the ranks, still proving his apparent penchant for controversy and evasion.

Stars - John Hurt, Jenny Agutter, Hugh Fraser, Nicholas Jones, Jeremy Clyde,Paul Brooke

Episode 1 - March of the Grey Men
Episode 2 - The Lady
Episode 3 - Foreign Parts
Episode 4 - Defence of the Realm
Episode 5 - Into the Wilderness
Episode 6 - Leaving Home

Broadcast from 15 January 2004 on BBC Four

6 x 30 minute episodes

Seed back and share with others. :)
